e)chskhme/nai polutelw=s kai\ th=| poikili/a| diafo/rws w(/ste tw=n ce/nwn e)ni/ous tw=n paralhfqe/ntwn o)knei=n to\n a)gkw=na e)pi\ ta\ proskefa/laia e)rei/dein. oi( de\ pro/teron e)pi\ tou= klinthri/ou yilou= diakarterou=ntes par' o(/lhn th\n sunousi/an, o(/te to\n a)gkw=na a(/pac e)rei/seian ei)s de\ th\n proeirhme/nhn trufh\n h)=lqon pothri/wn t' e)kqe/seis pollw=n kai\ brwma/twn pantodapw=s pepoihme/nwn paraqe/seis, e)/ti de\ mu/rwn e)chllagme/nwn, w(s d' au(/tws oi)/nwn kai\ traghma/twn. kai\ tou/twn h)=rcan oi( mikro\n pro\ *kleome/nous basileu/santes *)/areus kai\ *)akro/tatos au)likh\n e)cousi/an zhlw/santes: ou(\s tosou=ton au)=qis u(perh=ra/n tines tw=n i)diwtw=n tw=n e)n *spa/rth| genome/nwn kat' e)kei=non to\n xro/non th=| polutelei/a| th=| kaq' au(tou/s, w(/ste dokei=n to\n *)/area kai\ to\n *)akro/taton eu)telei/a| pa/ntas u(perbeblhke/nai tou\s a)felesta/tous tw=n pro/teron. *kleome/nhs de\ polu\ diene/gkas tw=| te sunidei=n pra/gmata, kai/toi ne/os w)\n, kai\ kata\ th\n di/aitan a)fele/statos ge/gonen. h)/dh ga\r thlikou/twn pragma/twn h(gou/menos e)/mfasin toi=s paralambanome/nois pro\s th\n qusi/an e)poi/ei dio/ti ta\ para\ e)kei/nois tw=n par' au)to\n ou)de\n katadee/steron ei)/h paraskeuazo/mena, pollw=n de\ presbeiw=n paraginome/nwn pro\s au)to\n ou)de/pote e)nwri/steron tou= kateiqisme/nou sunh=gen kairou=, pentakli/nou te diestrw/nnuto ou)de/pote plei=on o(/te de\ mh\ parei/h presbei/a, tri/klinon. kai\ pro/stagma ou)k e)gi/neto di' e)dea/trou ti/s ei(/setai kai\ katakliqh/setai prw=tos, a)ll' o(

gogguli/des. tau/tas *)apolla=s e)n tw=| peri\ tw=n e)n *peloponnh/sw| po/lewn u(po\ *lakedaimoni/wn ga/stras fhsi\ kalei=sqai. *ni/kandros d' o( *kolofw/nios e)n tai=s *glw/ssais para\ *boiwtoi=s ga/stras o)noma/zesqai ta\s kra/mbas, ta\s de\ gogguli/das zekelti/das, *)ameri/as de\ kai\ *timaxi/das ta\s koloku/ntas zekelti/das kalei=sqai. *speu/sippos d' e)n
deute/rw| *(omoi/wn r(afani/s, fhsi/, gogguli/s, r(a/fus, a)na/rrinon o(/moia. th\n de\ r(a/fun *glau=kos e)n tw=| *)oyartutikw=| dia\ tou= p yilw=s kalei= r(a/pun. tou/tois d' ou)de\n a)/llo e)sti\n o(/moion ei) mh\ h( nu=n prosagoreuome/nh bounia/s. *qeo/frastos de/ bounia/da me\n ou)k o)noma/zei, a)/rrena de) kalei= tina gogguli/da, kai\ i)/sws au(/th e)sti\n h( bounia/s. *ni/kandros d' e)n toi=s *gewrgikoi=s th=s bounia/dos mnhmoneu/ei:

o)/fr' a)\n i)/sai plaqa/noisi xamhlo/terai qale/qwsi.

*qeo/frastos de\ gogguli/dwn fhsi\n ei)=nai ge/nh du/o, a)/rren kai\ qh=lu: gi/nesqai d' a)/mfw e)k tou= au)tou= spe/rmatos. *poseidw/nios d' o( a)po\ th=s stoa=s e)n th=| e(bdo/mh| kai\ ei)kosth=| tw=n i(storiw=n peri\ th\n *dalmati/an fhsi\ gi/gnesqai gogguli/das a)khpeu/tous kai\ a)gri/ous stafuli/nous. *di/filos d' o( *si/fnios i)atro\s h( gogguli/s, fhsi/, leptuntikh/ e)sti kai\ drimei=a kai\ du/speptos, e)/ti de\ pneumatwtikh/. krei/ttwn de/, fhsi/n, h( bounia\s kaqe/sthken glukute/ra ga/r e)sti kai\ peptikwte/ra pro\s tw=|
eu)sto/maxos ei)=nai kai\ tro/fimos, h( de\ o)ptwme/nh, fhsi/, gogguli\s ma=llon pe/ttetai, peritto/teron de\ leptu/nei. tau/ths mnhmoneu/ei *eu)/boulos e)n *)agkuli/wni ou(/tws:

kra/mbh. *eu)/dhmos o( *)aqhnai=os e)n tw=| peri\ laxa/nwn kra/mbhs fhsi\n ei)=nai ge/nh tri/a, th=s te kaloume/nhs a(lmuri/dos kai\ leiofu/llou kai\ selinou/sshs, th=| d' h(donh=| prw/thn kekri/sqai th\n a(lmuri/da. fu/etai d' e)n *)eretri/a| kai\ *ku/mh| kai\ *(ro/dw|, e)/ti de\ *kni/dw| kai\ *)efe/sw|: h( de\ leio/fullos a)na\ pa=san, fhsi/, xw/ran gi/gnetai. h( de\ selinou=ssa th\n o)nomasi/an e)/xei dia\ th\n ou)lo/thta: e)mferh\s ga/r e)sti seli/nw| kai\ kata\ th\n a)/llhn pu/knwsin. *qeo/frastos de\ ou(/tws gra/fei: th=s de\ r(afa/nou le/gw de\ th\n kra/mbhn h( me/n e)stin ou)lo/fullos, h( de\ a)gri/a *di/filos d' o( *si/fnio/s fhsi: kra/mbh de\ kalli/sth gi/netai kai\ glukei=a e)n *ku/mh|, e)n de\ *)alecandrei/a| pikra/, to\ d' e)k *(ro/dou fero/menon spe/rma ei)s *)aleca/ndreian e)pi\ e)niauto\n glukei=an poiei= th\n kra/mbhn, meq' o(\n xro/non pa/lin e)pixwria/zei. *ni/kandros d' e)n *gewrgikoi=s:

stafuli=nos. ou(=tos drimu/s e)sti, fhsi\n o( *di/filos, i(kanw=s de\ qreptiko\s kai\ eu)sto/maxos me/sws diaxwrhtiko/s te kai\ pneumatw/dhs, du/speptos, ou)rhtiko\s i(kanw=s, diegertiko\s pro\s a)frodi/sia: dio\ kai\ u(p' e)ni/wn fi/ltron kalei=tai. *noumh/nios d' e)n tw=| *(alieutikw=| fhsi:

mnhmoneu/ei tou= stafuli/nou kai\ *qeo/frastos. *faini/as d' e)n e' peri\ futw=n gra/fei ou(/tws: kata\ de\ th\n au)tou= tou= spe/rmatos fu/sin o( kalou/menos sh\y kai\ to\ tou= stafuli/nou spe/rma ka)n tw=| prw/tw| de/ fhsi: petasw/dh th\n tw=n sperma/twn a)pei/lhfe fu/sin a)/nnhson, ma/raqon, stafuli=nos, kaukali/s, kw/neion, ko/rion, ski/lla, h(\n e)/nioi muhfo/non. e)pei\ de\ a)/rou e)mnhmo/neusen o( *ni/kandros, prosapodote/on o(/ti kai\ *faini/as e)n tw=| proeirhme/nw| bibli/w| gra/fei ou(/tws : drako/ntion, o(\ e)/nioi a)/ron a)rwnia.10 to\n de\ stafuli=non *dioklh=s e)n prw/tw| *(ugieinw=n a)stafuli=non kalei=. to\ de\ karto\n kalou/menon me/gas d' e)sti\n kai\ eu)auch\s stafuli=nos eu)xulo/tero/n e)sti tou= stafuli/nou kai\ ma=llon qermantikw/teron, ou)rhtikw/teron, eu)sto/maxon, eu)oikono/mhton, w(s o( *di/filos i(storei=.
kefalwto/n. tou=to kai\ pra/sion kalei=sqai/ fhsin o( au)to\s *di/filos. kai\ eu)xulo/teron ei)=nai tou= kartou=. ei)=nai de\ kai\ au)to\ me/sws leptuntiko/n, qreptiko/n te kai\ pneumatw=des. *)epai/netos d' e)n *)oyartutikw=| ta\ kefalwta\ kalei=sqai/ fhsi ghqulli/das. tou=to de\ to\ o)/noma mnh/mhs eu(ri/skw tetuxhko\s para\ me\n *eu)bou/lw| e)n *pornoboskw=|

oi( de\ to\ gh/quon kalou/menon tou=to/ fasin ei)=nai, ou(= mnhmoneu/ei *fru/nixos e)n *kro/nw| : o(/per e)chgou/menos dra=ma *di/dumos o(/moia/ fhsin ei)=nai ta\ gh/qua toi=s legome/nois a)mpelopra/sois, ta\ d' au)ta\ kai\ ghqulli/das le/gesqai. mnhmoneu/ei tw=n ghqulli/dwn kai\ *)epi/xarmos e)n *filokth/th| ou(/tws: e)n de\ sko/roda du/o kai\ gaqulli/des du/o. *)aristofa/nhs *ai)olosi/kwni deute/rw|:

la/xana, knista\ h)\ ste/mfula, o( *murti/los e)/fh: a)lla\ mh\n kai\ o)/rniqas kai\ o)rni/qia nu=n mo/nws h( sunh/qeia kalei= ta\s qhlei/as, w(=n o(rw= perifero/menon plh=qos kai\ *xru/sippos d' o( filo/sofos e)n tw=| pe/mptw| peri\ tou= kalou= kai\ th=s h(donh=s gra/fei ou(/tws : ' kaqa/per tine\s ta\s leuka\s o)/rniqas tw=n melainw=n h(di/ous ei)=nai ma=llon), a)lektruo/nas de\ kai\ a)lektoride/as tou\s a)/rrenas: tw=n a)rxai/wn de\ to\ o)/rnis kai\ a)rsenikw=s kai\ qhlukw=s lego/ntwn e)p' a)/llwn o)rne/wn, ou) peri\ tou/tou tou= ei)dikou=, peri\ ou(= fhsin h( sunh/qeia o)/rniqas w)nh/sasqai. *(/omhros me\n ou)=n fhsi:

au(/th pot' e)ceso/bhse ta\s o)/rnis mo/lis.

o)/rniqa d' ou) poiw= se th=s e)mh=s o(dou=. *cenofw=n d' e)n deute/rw| *paidei/as: ' e)pi\ me\n tou\s o)/rniqas tw=| i)sxurota/tw| xeimw=ni.' *me/nandros *didu/mais, ' o)/rneis fe/rwn e)lh/luqa.' kai\ e(ch=s o)/rniqas a)poste/llei fhsi/n. o(/ti de\ kai\ e)pi\ tou= plhquntikou= o)/rnis le/gousi pro/keitai to\ *mena/ndreion martu/rion a)lla\ kai\ *)alkma/n pou/ fhsi:

o)/rnis q' o(moi/ous tou\s neottou\s tw=| patri/;
